subject: Shifter
description_text:
Hi i purchased a Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1 wheel last
week .
The shifter on the left hand side , the base is firmly connected to the
button box . But the paddle itself is very loose. I have tried to tighten
the allen keys to see if that would cure it . but it still slides in and
out and up and down. The right one is solid. Do I have to return the hole
wheel  or can you just send a replacement shifter ?

Thanks Anthony Dickens

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Dickens,  Could you please provide a video? This issue can usually be resolved by tightening it with a screwdriver. Please send the video to me via Google Drive and make sure the access permission is set to view.Â
